title: Translate into a System of Equations
text: The sum of the two numbers is 37: $$n+m=37$$.

title: Translate into a System of Equations

title: Solve the System of Equations
text: To solve the system of equations, use elimination. The equations are in standard form and the coefficients of $$m$$ are opposites.

title: Solve for $$n$$
text: $$m$$ will be eliminated and then solve for $$n$$.\n$$2n=46$$\n$$n=23$$

title: Substitute and Solve for $$m$$
text:
Substitute $$n=23$$ into one of the original equations and solve for $$m$$.
$$n+m=37$$
$$23+m=37$$
$$m=14$$
